allow: Bash(powershell -Command ".\\.specify\\scripts\\powershell\\create-new-feature.ps1 -Json -ShortName ''portfolio-frontend'' -Number 2 ''Portfolio Website Frontend - Next.js App Router with TypeScript, Tailwind CSS, Shadcn/ui. Public pages: Home, Projects, Blog, About, Contact. Admin dashboard with full CRUD. Dark/light mode, responsive design, animations, SEO, accessibility.''")
Bash(timeout 10 bash -c 'for i in {1..10}; do curl -s http://localhost:8000/docs > /dev/null 2>&1 && echo ""Backend ready!"" && exit 0; sleep 1; done; echo ""Waiting for backend...""')
Bash(if not exist backend mkdir backend)
Bash(if not exist backendapp mkdir backendapp)
Bash(if not exist backendapproutes mkdir backendapproutes)
Bash(if not exist backendapputils mkdir backendapputils)
Bash(if not exist backendtests mkdir backendtests)
